"Chat Settings":
"Shortcuts

Quickly send frequently used chat phrases by adding them ahead of time in this window, then invoking them with keyboard shortcuts such as Ctrl+F1. You can add up to ten shortcuts."

"Autowords

Add chat phrases to be automatically sent out whenever you have done something specific, such as starting a quest or leveling up. You can add up to three phrases for each item by pressing the plus (+) buttons next to them. When you set more than one phrase for the same item, they will be randomly sent out each time.

See the Online Manual below for more information:
<&URL pso2_players_manual_communication_shortcut>"
